events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and have begun the review process.
The candidate's application has been categorised under the engineering department, specifically for the software developer role.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to the case to ensure a smooth and timely communication with the candidate.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, confirming the candidate meets the key qualifications and is interested in proceeding.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm for the next steps.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the candidate for next Monday, ensuring all stakeholders are informed and prepared.
The candidate has completed the technical interview and performed well across all aspects, showing strong engineering skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit, company policies, and candidate expectations.
The HR interview went positively, with the candidate demonstrating alignment with company values and clear motivation.
We have drafted and sent the job offer to the candidate outlining role, compensation, and benefits in detail.
The candidate has reviewed the offer and provided positive feedback, asking minor questions about start dates and onboarding.
The candidate happily accepted the offer and confirmed their commitment to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process has officially started with documentation provided and initial training sessions scheduled.
The hiring process for the software engineer role is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated into the team.
